original_title: Suspects arrested over ‘Club Wasantha’ murder remanded
original_body_lines: The seven suspects including the tattoo studio owner arrested in connection with the shooting incident in Athurugiriya, which claimed the lives of businessman Surendra Wasantha Perera alias ‘Club Wasantha’ and another person, have been remanded by the Kaduwela Magistrate’s Court.
The accused were ordered remanded until July 22 after being produced before the court on Wednesday (10).
